Title: Relates to providing residential and day services to certain individuals with a developmental disability
Summary: Provides residential and day services to certain individuals with a developmental disability where such services are provided by a certified integrated residential community program.
LawCode: Amd ยง365-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to providing residential and day services to certain individuals with a developmental disability
